props.aspectRatio: Calculated as **width/height**, so for a 1920x1080px image this will be **1.7778**. Will be calculated automatically if omitted
props.contain: Prevents the image from being cropped if it doesn't fit
props.gradient: Overlays a gradient onto the image. Only supports (linear-gradient)[https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/gradient/linear-gradient] syntax, anything else should be done with classes (see examples)
props.lazySrc: Something to show while waiting for the main image to load, typically a small base64-encoded thumbnail. Has a slight blur filterapplied.Use (vuetify-loader)[https://github.com/vuetifyjs/vuetify-loader] to generate automatically
props.position: Overrides the default to change which parts get cropped off. Uses the same syntax as (background-position)[https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/background-position]
